review: It was a great experience to meet Dr Ankit Khandelwal. He has explained me all queries and guide me about future treatment process.

tags: Value for money,
review:
Bad Experience in the name of Specialist service- Abnormal  charges way too high for the work not done, Also,
Dr. Ankit Khandelwal didn't attend at appointment time. 

I had a visit to Gajanan Clinic (Harishmukherjee Road, opposite to Balwant Singh Dhaba) to get my mother's permanent denture repaste. Booked an appointment for Dr. Ankit Khandelwal ******* ****** for 13th Feb'23'.the appointment was prepond by Dr. Ankit, so visited the chamber as per their rescheduled time. Dr. Ankit handed over to another Dr. Ananya Misra as he was in hurry. Dr. Ananya Misra took the x-ray and cleaned the denture and repasted it. 
It was sheer 10 minutes work for which they took over an hour and made a heafty bill of Rs.4,800 
(Consultation =500+ x-ray=300+provisional cementation of crown to tooth 4,000)

It was just pasting that she did *** **** ***** ** ******* ***** ******* ** ****** **** **** **** ******** *** *********** ** ****** **** *** ****** *** ************ *********** *  *** **** **** **** **** ******** ******** **** ***** ****** ********** **** **** **** *** ****** ****** ** ***** ***** *** ***** ** ** ********* **** **** ***** *** ***** **** ** ******* **** *** *** ************  ****** ** ****l
reply_text:
Respected mam,
I had looked into your concern and found the following 
1)consultation and opd was done by dr ankit only 
2)it was found that you had a dislodged fixed partial denture of the upper jaw with food impaction and decay of the abutment 
3) as it was a denture work and dr ankit is a surgeon case was handed over to Mds prosthodontist (denture,crown & bridge specialist), at our clinic we do specialist based work we have all the 6 clinical mds specialist of dentistry here and few medical specialist too
4)X-ray was taken to evaluate the Abutment health and was found that the entrance fillings of rc treat 11,21,23 was dislodged as per apical lesion was there
5)as patient did not give consent for any endodontic rx and insisted on recemntation
Abutments were cleaned & modified, prosthesis was cleaned & recemented with giving type 1
6)a total invoice of 4800 was generated ( consultation,xray, 4 unit crown cementation)
A discount of 1500 was also given as mam is from dr fraternity 
7) pls note mam charges differ from place to place so does the way of treatment 
The senior doctors name that you are taking is a friend of mine and is a general dentist 
Nevertheless sorry for any confusions and regret any inconvenience caused
Thank you
Take care

The procedure was performed quickly, with no pain at all (big surprise) and without any hassle. We would recommend it to anyone and everyone.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited the clinic for treatment of mucocele in the inner lip region. Initially I was a bit tensed since it was a cyst like formation however Dr. Khandelwal was excellent explaining every detail about it. The surgery went absolutely smooth and painless. Experienced no pain or complication after the surgery. I would highly appreciate the fact that follow-up calls were made from the clinic regarding the well being of the patient. I would highly recommend Dr. Ankit Khandelwal for explanation of health issue, treatment satisfaction and follow-up made by his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Simply So Wonderful. DR. ANKIT KHANDELWAL'S TREATMENT PROCESS IS EXCELLENT. HE UNDERSTANDS WELL THE NATURE OF TOTAL PROBLEMATIC DIFFICULTIES OF EACH DIFFERENT PATIENTS' AND AFTER STUDYING METICULOUSLY THOSE
DIFFICULTIES,HE DOES THE TREATMENT FOR THEM WHICH SINCERELY IS UNIQUE AND AWESOME,AS I REALLY FELT <"NO TRAUMA AFTER HAVING BEEN TREATED BY DR.ANKIT. FOR THIS REASON & HENCE, I AM NOW FEELING REALLY GOOD ðŸ‘AND FINE.>
I WISH HIM MORE SUCCESS AND WARM WISHES FOR HIS JOURNEY OF THIS SPECIALITY MEDICAL TREATMENT RELATED PATH OF HIS LIFE AND OFCOURSE HE SHOULD BE THE MOST FIRST FRONTLINER WELL-FAMED SURGEON OF INDIA.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The patient was my sister-in-law, he had an accident by falling from bike without helmet and got injured in lower jaw. He had pain chewing and biting.
We were not sure if that is temporary of caused any significant damage inside.
So we consulted him and did 2 x-ray TMJ, full CBCT in house.
Doctor Ankit is a very friendly and politely explained us total matter, the reports showed no sign of fracture and following his suggestions our patient pain of jaw slowly recovered.
Although the cost of scans are bit high for us 7k, but he also gave one complimentary scan for us as the new chamber and machine.
His focused and careful attitude to treat patient is admirable.

review:
I really appreciate Dr Ankit khandelwal for his kindness and co-operation. Last year during lockdown period accidently my front teeth got broken. It was really terrible moment. No Dentist was available. All reputed hospitals dental dept was closed. Even I couldn't manage to get x-ray of my teeth. 
At that difficult time Dr Ankit sir appears like an Angel of God. He opened his chamber specially for me , and does all neccessary things which was required for my teeth. 
I pray to Allah for his blessing to be upon him always. He is a great human being. 
Today I have brand new teeth through implant. Which is not less then original. 
Thanks so much. My great Doctor. I am really proud of you sir. I will never forget this in my life.
